ing: 1 pound Bob EvansÂ® Original Recipe Sausage Roll
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
8 ounces noodles, prepared according to package directions
des: "This easy classic is based on the usual beef stroganoff, but is made more flavorful using sausage."
ins: In large skillet over medium heat, crumble and cook sausage until browned.  Stir in soup, broth, mushrooms and Worcestershire sauce.  Bring to a boil and remove from heat.  Stir in sour cream.  Serve over hot noodles.
